txt.en: Defeat Umshûra the Glutton within the Mâkhda Khorbo
Umshûra's tentacles destroyed a ship!
Azagath's voice fills the cavern, 'Nakási, take your crew; breach the bulwarks across the docks. We must flood the harbour.'
Azagath continues, 'Belondor, take your crew within the temple. Do not let these interlopers breach the stairwell.'
'I must retrieve my prize from within Mâkhda Khorbo before we take to the sea.'
Azagath's voice deepens, 'As for our pursuers. I believe they will find that the temple of blood and ash is unwelcoming to outsiders.'
Umshûra sinks into the dark water, defeated.
Azagath's personal guard, bolstered by a fell-shade of the man, bar the entrance to the smuggler's cover beneath Mâkhda Khorbo. Their orders are to slaughter any interlopers.
Belondor defends Azagath Sea-shadow's escape into the Mâkhda Khorbo. He and his crew will not yield and bar the way. There is no choice but to fight.
'You heard the captain!'
Belondor surrenders and admits there is no way to access the stairwell beyond the gateway. You must return to the dockyard and face what lies there.
'Nyah!'

After a battle at the Tower of Winds that crippled their ship, Azagath, Belondor, and Nakási, Reaper of the Waves flee to the cavernous underground beneath Mâkhda Khorbo. The subterranean harbour served as an illicit smuggler's den for the Temple of the All-seeing Eye, and the evil wrought by its inhabitant remains in the stone.
'Ahh!'
'They go no further.'
'No!'
'Nakási, be safe. There is more yet to do.\q
Defeat Azagath's Shade and entourage
Belondor responds, 'We will see it done, Azagath. Let's move out, crew!'
'Azagath! This is not over!'
'No more! I am spent. My crew... my friends are dead. I yield.'
Defeat Belondor and his crew
'I will return to the city and face my penance. Azagath will pay by my hand.'
'They won't get by us, captain.'
'Aye, Captain!'
'Take what treasure you will from the temple, but leave me and my crew to misery.'
Defeat the denizen of the deep in the dockyard of Mâkhda Khorbo
Defeat Umshûra the Glutton within the Mâkhda Khorbo
'As you command.'

After escaping the Citadel of winds, Azagath Sea-shadow, Belondor, and Nakási Wave-reaper entered the Mâkhda Khorbo. You pursued them into the temple of ash and blood and now scour the depths for the trio.
'Prepare yourselves, mates.'
The boat damaged and weakened Umshûra!
'Persistent. Usually, I admire that quality. Given that you are my pursuer, I find it disagreeable. Nevertheless, you'll not stop us here; we will end you.'
'My crew and I will stop you here. You shall not ascend to face Lord Azagath. We will end your meddling here and now.'
'It is best you retreat now while you can still walk. I would not advise crawling through the ruins of the temple of Ash and Blood.'
The Depths of Mâkhda Khorbo -- Tier 1
'But if you insist on pursuing your own demise, we will oblige.'
'Crew! Form rank.'
'I commend you for your tenacity. Come forth. We will afford you a moment of respite to compose yourselves.'
'Gather your crew, quickly. Once the gate is closed we will teach you about discipline.'
'Very well. Let us begin.'
Umshûra rises from the deep!
'No! What have you done?'
Umshûra's tentacles begin crushing a ship!
Umshûra's tentacles begins crushing two ships!
Umshûra's tentacles begins crushing two ships!
Umshûra's tentacles begins crushing two boat!
Umshûra's tentacles begin crushing two ships!
'We should not linger in this place longer than we must. We will unseal the underground river, restore the dock, and take a smaller ship to sea - wait, did you hear something?'
'To the Dry Docks'
'A foetid wave approaches the dock to the right of Umshûra!'
'To the Flooded Docks'
'I would applaud your persistence were it not vexing. Alas, you have spoiled years of planning and careful construction in a matter of weeks.'
'Azagath's voice fills the room. \qYour crew fails you, Belondor. I do not abide Failure.\q'
'I will, however, offer my assistance.'
'They will serve me better in death than they served you in life.'
Nakási replies, 'As you wish, Azagath.'
Nakási addresses her crew, 'You heard the Sea-shadow. Make haste to the bulwarks and bring them down!'
'Instead, then, let me welcome you to your tomb.'
'Watch yourself, old man. I'll see you on the other side.'
'It is a pity I shall not see the life leave your eyes, but my calling lies deeper within the Mâkhda Khorbo.'
'Do not despair. My crew will tell me how you begged before your deaths.'
'Come Nakási and Belondor; we have much to do within. My crew and shade will see these interlopers become the latest sacrifice in this temple.'
'As one!'
\qUmshûra the Glutton is defeated. Azagath and Nakási cannot be found.\q
'So it begins...'
'Yes, Belondor.'
Defeat Belondor and his Crew
Defeat Azagath's Sea-shade and his crew
'A foetid wave approaches the dock to the left of Umshûra!'
Defeat Belondor and his crew
